item.Q:
Write the character:
inside; inner; internal; within; interior
item.A:
traditional: 內
nèi
内容 (內容) nèiróng content; substance; details

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: a place; an open space; a field; a courtyard; classifier for events such as sports matches, concerts, or cultural events; classifier for number of exams
2: threshing floor; classifier for events and happenings; classifier for number of some languages and actions (cannot be followed by a noun)
item.A:
traditional: 場
1: chǎng 2: cháng
立场 (立場) lìchǎng position; standpoint 电场 (電場) diàncháng electric field

tā
它本身 tāběnshēn itself

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: from; to obey; to observe; to follow; surname
2: lax; yielding; unhurried
item.A:
traditional: 從
1: cóng 2: cōng
从而 (從而) cóngér thus; thereby 从属 (從屬) cōngshǔ hypotaxis

kuài
快速 kuàisù fast; high-speed; rapid

traditional: 歡
huān
欢迎 (歡迎) huānyíng to welcome; welcome

item.Q:
Write the character:
arrive; most; to; until
item.A:
zhì
甚至 shènzhì even; so much so that

item.Q:
Write the character:
set up; to stand
item.A:
lì
建立 jiànlì creation; set up; construction; build; establish; set up

item.Q:
Write the character:
eye; item; section; list; catalogue; table of contents; order (taxonomy); goal; name; title
item.A:
mù
目前 mùqián at the present time; currently

shè
社会 (社會) shèhuì society

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: Chinese musical note; fit; to join
2: 100 ml; one-tenth of a peck; measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
item.A:
1: hé 2: gě
结合 (結合) jiéhé to combine; to link; to integrate; binding 化合价 (化合價) huàgějìa quantivalency

item.Q:
Write the character:
hope; expect; to visit; to gaze (into the distance); look towards; towards
item.A:
wàng
希望 xīwàng to wish for; to desire; to hope

zěn
怎么 (怎麼) zěnme how?; what?; why?

item.Q:
Write the character:
to recognize; to know; to admit
item.A:
traditional: 認
rèn
认为 (認為) rènwéi to believe; to think; to consider; to feel

item.Q:
Write the character:
to tell; to inform; to say
item.A:
gào
报告 (報告) bàogào to inform; report; make known; speech; talk; lecture

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: more; even more; further; still; still more
2: to change
item.A:
1: gèng 2: gēng
更加 gèngjīa more (than sth else); even more 更换 (更換) gēnghuàn replace

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: almost
2: how much; how many; several; a few
item.A:
traditional: 幾
1: jī 2: jǐ
几乎 (幾乎) jīhū almost; nearly; practically 几何 (幾何) jǐhé geometry

item.Q:
Write the character:
to check; to verify; to test; to examine; to take an exam
item.A:
kǎo
考虑 (考慮) kǎolǜ to think over; to consider; consideration

dù
温度 (溫度) wēndù temperature

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: difficult (to...); problem; difficulty; difficult; not good
2: disaster; distress; to scold
item.A:
traditional: 難
1: nán 2: nàn
困难 (困難) kūnnán difficult 难民 (難民) nànmín refugee

item.Q:
Write the character: nàn
(nànmín de nàn)
item.A:
traditional: 難
disaster; distress; to scold
难民 (難民) nànmín refugee

traditional: 社會
shèhuì society

traditional: 認為
rènwéi to believe; to think; to consider; to feel

traditional: 它們
tāmen they (for inanimate objects)
mùqián at the present time; currently
mùdì purpose; aim; goal; target; objective

traditional: 怎麼
zěnme how?; what?; why?
chéngdù degree (level or extent); level

traditional: 內部
nèibù interior; inside (part, section); internal
gāodù height; very; high degree; highly; height; highness

traditional: 從而
cóngér thus; thereby
chénglì establish; set up
gōngshè commune
gèngjīa more (than sth else); even more

traditional: 立場
lìchǎng position; standpoint

traditional: 認真
rènzhēn earnest; serious; take seriously; take to heart

traditional: 長度
chángdù length

traditional: 國內
guónèi domestic; internal (to a country); civil
hézuò to cooperate; to collaborate; to work together; cooperation
hélǐ rational; reasonable; fair

kànchū to make out; to see
kānchū to see
